text:
An unidentified man wearing a helmet snatched a portion of a gold chain from a mill worker at Sulur on Monday.

The police said that P. Sasikala (36) was on foot when the accused riding a bike in the opposite direction slowed down near her and snatched her six-sovereign gold chain. The victim had reportedly managed to save a portion of the chain by holding it. However, it is learnt that a major portion of the chain was snatched away.
title: Chain snatching
